## Frustum.containsPoint() method

Tests if a point is inside the frustum.

**Signature:**

```typescript
containsPoint(pt: Vector3, epsl?: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pt | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The point to test. |
|  epsl | number | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the point is inside the frustum, otherwise false
